long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Background: After opening the Amazon website, we need to frequently search and copy product inventory information from the page for inventory warning, but frequent copying work seriously affects our efficiency.
This plug-in replaces the manual work of frequently copying data from the page after opening the page, saving our workload and making no mistakes.
This plug-in is for internal use only, not for external sales and used
Please review, thank you.
